freeShipping.benefit: Get global delivery without the extra cost

reviews.title: What Our Customers Say
reviews.subtitle: Real experiences from thousands of satisfied customers who trust TDA Global for their shopping needs

review1.text: TDA Global has completely transformed my online shopping experience. Fast delivery, genuine products, and excellent customer service. I've been a loyal customer for 3 years now!
review1.name: Jason J. Smith

review2.text: What impressed me most is their 24/7 customer support. When I had an issue with my order, they resolved it within hours. Truly professional service!
review2.name: David A. Wheeler

review3.text: The product quality is always guaranteed and the return policy is very convenient. TDA Global is my first choice for online shopping.
review3.name: William L. Jones

AboutPage.title: TDA Global Joint Stock Company
AboutPage.subtitle: Learn about our mission, vision, and the values that shape everything we do

companyInfo.name: TDA Global
companyInfo.description: Founded with a passion for excellence and a dedication to quality, TDA Global has grown to become a trusted provider of custom lifestyle decor solutions. We combine art, creativity, and functionality to elevate everyday spaces and experiences.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.description1: Since 2021, TDA Global has built a scalable e-commerce ecosystem rooted in Vietnam and expanding across 15+ global markets.
journey.description2: From streamlined operations to tailored POD and curated products, we grow by design—data-driven, system-refined, and experience-led.
journey.description3: Fulfilling thousands of orders each month, we move forward with a simple belief:
journey.motto: Do it right. Do it consistently. Go far.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At TDA Global, we are dedicated to crafting exceptional lifestyle and workspace accessories that inspire creativity and elevate everyday experiences. Our mission is to combine aesthetic design with function while maintaining the highest standards of quality and attention to detail.
mission.description2: We believe that well-designed spaces and objects can enhance productivity, spark creativity, and improve overall wellbeing. Every product we create reflects this commitment to excellence.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description1: We envision a world where thoughtfully designed products become an integral part of daily life, enhancing experiences and inspiring creativity. Our vision is to be at the forefront of lifestyle innovation, setting new standards for quality, design, and functionality.
vision.description2: By maintaining a clear focus on our core values and constantly refining our approach, we aim to create products that not only meet but exceed expectations.

coreValues.title: Our Core Values
coreValues.subtitle: The principles that guide our work and define our approach

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We commit to excellence in every detail of our products, from concept to delivery, ensuring lasting value and performance.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: We respect and protect the innovative ideas and designs we develop for our clients, maintaining strict privacy standards.

refinement.title: Refinement
refinement.description: We pursue elegance and sophistication in design, creating products that stand out for their subtle beauty and attention to detail.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: We push boundaries to create unique, innovative solutions that inspire and delight, constantly exploring new ideas and approaches.

corePrinciples.title: About Us, Mission & Vision
corePrinciples.subtitle: The core principles that guide everything we do and every decision we make

timeline.title: History
timeline.subtitle: Key milestones in our journey of growth and innovation

2021.title: Founded
2021.description: Launched with a focus on Print-on-Demand (POD), operating our own Etsy and Amazon shops to validate and refine the model.

2022.title: Operational Breakthrough
2022.description: Optimized end-to-end workflows; introduced lean systems and transparent, data-driven operations.

2023.title: Service Expansion
2023.description: Started offering eCommerce shop management services globally. Scaled to hundreds of thousands of shops and millions of products.

2024.title: Standardization & Market Adaptation
2024.description: Enhanced system flexibility and integration to align with new-generation eCommerce trends and user experience expectations.

2025.title: Global Reach
2025.description: Operating across 15+ international markets with a distributed team and a growing eCommerce ecosystem built for scale and sustainability.

contactCta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
contactCta.description: Join TDA Global in creating positive value for the community and society

Footer.companyDescription: Leading e-commerce solutions for Amazon, Etsy, and POD marketplaces.

hero.title: Exploring the intersection of form and function through our creative endeavors

craftingExperiences.title: Crafting Experiences
craftingExperiences.description: At TDA Global, we create products that enhance environments and elevate experiences. Our work combines innovative design with meticulous craftsmanship to deliver solutions that inspire and delight.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.subtitle: We specialize in creating exceptional products that blend form and function

lighting.title: Lighting
lighting.description: Illuminating spaces with thoughtfully designed lighting solutions.

workspaceSetup.title: Workspace Setup
workspaceSetup.description: Creating harmonious environments that foster productivity and creativity.

creativeAccessories.title: Creative Accessories
creativeAccessories.description: Enhancing experiences through thoughtfully designed accessories.

designProcess.title: Our Design Process
designProcess.subtitle: How we transform ideas into exceptional products

refine.title: Refine
refine.description: Perfecting every detail of the design

designProcess.processDescription: Our process is guided by a commitment to excellence at every stage. We believe that great design comes from thorough exploration, thoughtful refinement, and meticulous execution. This approach ensures that every product we create exceeds expectations in both form and function.

cta.title: Let's Create Something Exceptional
cta.description: Interested in learning more about our work or discussing a potential project? Get in touch with our team today.

hero.title: Join Our Team
hero.subtitle: Be part of a team that values creativity, innovation, and excellence

culture.title: Our Culture
culture.subtitle: At TDA Global, we foster a collaborative environment where creativity flourishes and every team member can contribute to our shared success.

collaborative.title: Collaborative
collaborative.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and open communication. Our collaborative approach allows us to share ideas freely, learn from each other, and create better solutions together.

creativeFreedom.title: Creative Freedom
creativeFreedom.description: We encourage creativity and innovation at every level. Our team members have the freedom to explore new ideas, experiment with different approaches, and contribute their unique perspectives to our work.

workLifeBalance.title: Work-Life Balance
workLifeBalance.description: We value the wellbeing of our team and recognize the importance of maintaining a healthy work-life balance. We provide flexible arrangements that allow our team members to thrive both professionally and personally.

continuousLearning.title: Continuous Learning
continuousLearning.description: We're committed to growth and development. Our team members are encouraged to continuously expand their skills and knowledge through various learning opportunities, workshops, and collaborative projects.

whyJoin.title: Why Join TDA Global
whyJoin.subtitle: We offer more than just a job—we provide an opportunity to be part of something meaningful while developing your skills and career.

innovativeProjects.title: Innovative Projects
innovativeProjects.description: Work on creative, cutting-edge projects that challenge and inspire you.

professionalGrowth.title: Professional Growth
professionalGrowth.description: Develop your skills with ongoing learning opportunities and mentorship.

collaborativeTeam.title: Collaborative Team
collaborativeTeam.description: Join a supportive team that values diverse perspectives and ideas.

workLifeBalance.title: Work-Life Balance
workLifeBalance.description: Enjoy flexible arrangements that respect your personal time and wellbeing.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.description: Your contributions will be valued, recognized, and rewarded appropriately.

careerAdvancement.title: Career Advancement
careerAdvancement.description: Clear paths for advancement and opportunities to grow within the company.

openPositions.title: Open Positions
openPositions.subtitle: Join our growing team and help shape the future of global eCommerce
openPositions.moreSoon: More positions opening soon - Stay tuned!

generalAccountant.title: General Accountant
generalAccountant.description: Join our Finance team as a General Accountant and play a key role in maintaining the financial health of our organization. You'll be responsible for managing financial records, ensuring compliance with accounting standards, and supporting strategic financial decisions.
responsibilities: Maintain accurate financial records and prepare financial statements
Process accounts payable and receivable transactions
Assist with month-end and year-end closing procedures
Prepare tax returns and ensure compliance with tax regulations
Support budget preparation and financial analysis
Collaborate with auditors during annual audits
Implement and maintain internal controls
Assist with special projects and ad-hoc analysis
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field
3+ years of experience in accounting or finance roles
Strong knowledge of accounting principles and financial reporting
Proficiency in accounting software and MS Excel
CPA certification preferred but not required
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent attention to detail and accuracy
Good communication and interpersonal skills
generalAccountant.workingLocation: No. 11, Galaxy 5, Galaxy Van Phuc, Van Phuc Ward, Ha Dong District, Hanoi

reconciliationOfficer.title: eCommerce Transaction Reconciliation Officer
reconciliationOfficer.description: Join our Operations team as an eCommerce Transaction Reconciliation Officer. This entry-level position offers excellent learning opportunities in financial operations and eCommerce payment processing.
responsibilities: Reconcile daily eCommerce transactions across multiple platforms
Match payment gateway records with bank statements
Identify and resolve transaction discrepancies
Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly reconciliation reports
Monitor and track refund and chargeback processes
Maintain accurate records of all transaction data
Collaborate with customer service team on payment inquiries
Support month-end financial closing procedures
qualifications: High school diploma or equivalent required
No prior experience necessary - training provided
Strong attention to detail and accuracy
Basic computer skills and proficiency in Excel
Good organizational and time management skills
Ability to work with numbers and financial data
Strong communication skills
Willingness to learn and adapt to new systems
reconciliationOfficer.workingLocation: No. 11, Galaxy 5, Galaxy Van Phuc, Van Phuc Ward, Ha Dong District, Hanoi

packagingStaff.title: Packaging Staff
packagingStaff.description: Join our Fulfillment team as Packaging Staff. This hands-on role is perfect for detail-oriented individuals who want to be part of our product delivery process and customer satisfaction.
responsibilities: Package products according to company standards and customer requirements
Ensure product quality and packaging integrity
Maintain clean and organized packaging workspace
Label packages accurately with shipping information
Inspect products for defects before packaging
Meet daily packaging quotas and quality standards
Collaborate with warehouse team on inventory management
Follow safety protocols and procedures
qualifications: No prior experience required - training provided
Physical ability to stand for extended periods and lift packages
Strong attention to detail and quality focus
Ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment
Good hand-eye coordination and manual dexterity
Reliable and punctual work attendance
Team player with positive attitude
Basic understanding of safety procedures
packagingStaff.workingLocation: No. 11, Galaxy 5, Galaxy Van Phuc, Van Phuc Ward, Ha Dong District, Hanoi

customerServiceRep.title: Customer Service Representative
customerServiceRep.description: Join our Customer Experience team as a Customer Service Representative. You'll be the voice of our company, helping customers and ensuring they have exceptional experiences with our products and services.
responsibilities: Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, and chat
Resolve customer complaints and concerns professionally
Process orders, returns, and refund requests
Provide product information and recommendations
Maintain accurate customer records and interaction logs
Escalate complex issues to appropriate departments
Follow up with customers to ensure satisfaction
Contribute to team meetings and improvement initiatives
qualifications: High school diploma or equivalent
No prior experience necessary - comprehensive training provided
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Patient and empathetic approach to customer service
Basic computer skills and ability to learn new software
Strong problem-solving abilities
Ability to work flexible hours including weekends
Positive attitude and professional demeanor
customerServiceRep.workingLocation: No. 11, Galaxy 5, Galaxy Van Phuc, Van Phuc Ward, Ha Dong District, Hanoi

itHelpDesk.title: IT Help Desk Specialist
itHelpDesk.description: Join our IT team as a Help Desk Specialist. You'll be responsible for providing technical support to our employees and ensuring smooth operation of our technology infrastructure.
responsibilities: Provide first-level technical support to employees
Troubleshoot hardware and software issues
Set up and configure new computer systems
Maintain inventory of IT equipment and software licenses
Document and track support tickets using help desk software
Assist with network connectivity and security issues
Support video conferencing and collaboration tools
Escalate complex technical issues to senior IT staff
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or related field
1-2 years of experience in IT support or help desk roles
Knowledge of Windows and macOS operating systems
Familiarity with Microsoft Office Suite and Google Workspace
Basic understanding of networking concepts
Strong problem-solving and communication skills
Customer service oriented with patience and professionalism
Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple tasks
benefits: Modern work environment with latest technology
itHelpDesk.workingLocation: No. 11, Galaxy 5, Galaxy Van Phuc, Van Phuc Ward, Ha Dong District, Hanoi
